name: playwright-site-scanner
description: A standalone CLI tool for running Playwright tests against any website

scripts.pkg:all: npm run build && pkg dist/cli.js --config package.json --compress GZip
scripts.pkg:win: npm run build && pkg dist/cli.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/binaries/playwright-site-scanner-win.exe --compress GZip
scripts.pkg:mac: npm run build && pkg dist/cli.js --targets node18-macos-x64 --output dist/binaries/playwright-site-scanner-macos --compress GZip
scripts.pkg:linux: npm run build && pkg dist/cli.js --targets node18-linux-x64 --output dist/binaries/playwright-site-scanner-linux --compress GZip
scripts.release: npm run clean && npm run build:binaries

author: Alec
